snippet: More than 300 Afghan soldiers and members of the police forces are killed each month as the Afghans assume more responsibility for the war against the Taliban, military officials said Monday.
abstract: Afghan military officials say that more than 300 Afghan soldiers and members of police forces are killed each month as Afghans assume more responsibility for war against Taliban.
lead_paragraph: More than 300 Afghan soldiers and members of the police forces are killed each month as the Afghans assume more responsibility for the war against the Taliban, military officials said Monday.

headline.main: Local Afghan Forces’ Losses Rise, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Local Forces’ Losses Rise, Officials Say
